information.packages: Our premium packages include video & SMS credits and allow you to send an unlimited number of invitations by email and notification.
information.1-credit: A video credit = 1 participant minute. This is one minute spent per participant in video.
information.120mn: Ex: a one-hour video call with 2 people consumes 120 participant-minutes
information.questions: How much does a meeting cost? How many meetings can I do?
